name: Trick or Treat! (smallcatstudio)
description:
Use the arrow keys to move around, bump into people or items to interact! 

***Content warning for gore and implied murder, its not super graphic because of the style of the game, but you know your comfort zone best!***

Trick or Treat! is a little game I made in one week for the Spooktober 2021 Jam! This game was made in Bitsy using lots of hacks from Borksy.
